# Time Code Format Description Constants

**API Collection**

Constants that identify time code format descriptions.

## Constants

- **kCMTimeCodeFormatDescriptionKey_LangCode**: A key that describes the language code.
- **kCMTimeCodeFormatDescriptionKey_Value**: A key that describes the value.
- **kCMTimeCodeFormatDescriptionExtension_SourceReferenceName**: An extension that describes the source reference name.

## Constants

- **Audio Format Description Mask Codes**: Mask codes that identify audio formats.
- **Chroma Location Extension Constants**: Constants that identify chroma location extensions.
- **Clean Aperture Extension Constants**: Constants that identify clean aperture extensions.
- **Closed Caption Format Type Constants**: Types that identify closed caption formats.
- **Color Primary Extension Constants**: Constants that identify color primary extensions.
- **Field Detail Extension Constants**: Constants that identify field detail extensions.
- **Format Description Bridge Error Codes**: Bridge errors the system returns from format description calls.
- **Format Description Constants**: Constants that identify format descriptions.
- **Format Description Error Codes**: Errors the system returns from format description calls.
- **HEVC Temporal Level Info Constants**: Constants that identify HEVC temporal level information.
- **Metadata Format Description Constants**: Constants that identify metadata format descriptions.
- **MPEG-2-conformant Formats**: Constants that identify MPEG-2 formats.
- **Pixel Aspect Ratio Extension Constants**: Constants that identify pixel aspect ratio extensions.
- **Text Display Flags**: Flags that identify text display methods.
- **Text Format Constants**: Types that identify text formats.
